sentences.en: Advise on any remaining steps necessary to make site fully operable and better.
sentences.cn: 就任何剩余的必要步骤,使网站充分可操作性,更好.

sentences.en: And if the condition gets worse, is it operable?
sentences.cn: 如果情况更糟, 那还能做手术 吗 ?

sentences.en: Are all rescue craft still operable?
sentences.cn: 所有救生船都处在工作状态 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does as operable as those medicaments meeting have carat mildew element does Jie fight action?
sentences.cn: 克拉霉素与那些药物合用会有拮抗作用?

sentences.en: Finally, improve operable measures of optimizing service quality as the case.
sentences.cn: 最后针对该小区具体情况, 提出了可操作的优化服务质量的措施.

sentences.en: In several less severe rollover accidents, the bus body was replaced the vehicles were still operable.
sentences.cn: 在一些不太严重的翻车事故中, 巴士一般会被其他车辆替换,但仍具有可操作性.

sentences.en: Its features are normative, qualificative, operable, inheritable and changeable.
sentences.cn: 它的特征是规范性 、 限定性 、 可操作性 、 传承性和变迁性.

sentences.en: Less than half the rail network was operable.
sentences.cn: 只有不到半数的铁路网可以使用。

sentences.en: Onlywhenadeeper meaning is achieved can the detailed theories be applied to reality and be operable.
sentences.cn: 在意义提升到一定高度之后,具体的理论才更加切合实际和具有可操作性.

sentences.en: Results show that EM does provide unsteady design of turbomachinery an operable degree of freedom.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,缘线匹配为叶轮机非定常设计提供了可操作的自由度.

sentences.en: The method avoids inconvenience and error from human's experience, and is simple, observable and operable.
sentences.cn: 该方法避免了依赖人的经验所带来的不便和误差, 并且简单 、 直观、易操作.

sentences.en: The tri - parameter analysis frame proposed for the enterprise life cycle was verified being applicable and operable.
sentences.cn: 本文提出的三参数法基于生命周期理论的建筑企业竞争与发展战略分析框架,具有实用价值和可操作性.

sentences.en: When will the single currency be operable?
sentences.cn: 什么时候实行单一货币？

sentences.en: Will the pool be operable? How will decisions be made ( unanimously or by a majority )
sentences.cn: 专利池具有可操作性 吗 ?如何决定是否采用专利池 ( 全体通过,还是少数服从多数 )?
